name: arrayEach
description: Used to iterate over an array and run the function closure for each item in the array.

params.name: callback
params.description: Closure or a function reference that will be called for each of the iteration.

callback_params.description: The value for the current iteration
callback_params.name: value

callback_params.description: The current index for the iteration
callback_params.name: index

callback_params.description: A reference of the original array
callback_params.name: array

params.name: parallel
params.description: Lucee4.5+ CF2021+ Specifies whether the items can be executed in parallel

params.name: maxThreads
params.description: Lucee4.5+ CF2021+ The maximum number of threads to use when parallel = true

links.title: Map, Reduce and other Higher Order Functions
links.description: A Primer for map, reduce, filter, and Higher Order Functions in general.

links.title: ColdFusion 11: .map() and .reduce()
links.description: A look at the new .map() and .reduce() methods that each of array, struct and lists all have
